LisaacTM Platform

SDL_ACTIVE

SDL Application status
APPLICATION State:
app_mouse_focus
The application has mouse coverage 0x01
app_input_focus
The application has input focus 0x02
app_active
The application is active 0x04
get_application_state
This function returns the current state of the application, which is a bitwise combination of app_mouse_focus, app_input_focus , and app_active. If app_active is set, then the user is able to see your application, otherwise it has been iconified or disabled.
